testCases.label: Verify even_or_odd correctly identifies even numbers
testCases.description: Checks that even_or_odd returns 'Even' for values 2, 0, and -4.

testCases.label: Verify even_or_odd correctly identifies odd numbers
testCases.description: Checks that even_or_odd returns 'Odd' for values 1, -3, and 7.
